name: Cho~ricchi! Tamagotchi no Puchi Puchi Omisecchi
name_original: Cho~ricchi! Tamagotchi no Puchi Puchi Omisecchi
description:
'Cho~ricchi! Tamagotchi no Puchi Puchi Omisecchi' (otherwise known as ちょ~りっち! たまごっち の プチ プチ おみせっち) is a Tamagotchi game developed by Bandai Namco Games for the Nintendo 3DS. It was released only in Japan on April 19th, 2012. It is a 3D remake of the first Corner Shop game, featuring both original and animated characters from the 'Tamagotchi!' series. It is the first out of six 3DS entries.

*Like the other Corner Shop games, gameplay consists of working in shops with a chosen Tamagotchi partner. When players serve a certain number of customers, Princess Tamako will visit and upgrade the shop. The highest status a shop can upgrade to is the royal status. It contains all the same shops (excluding the two combination shops) and the same soundtrack as the original corner shop game.

(*Source of Description - 'Tamagotchi Fandom Wiki'; 'Cho~ricchi! Tamagotchi no Puchi Puchi Omisecchi')
